bioconda.name: bioconductor-heatplus
bioconda.summary: Heatmaps with row and/or column covariates and colored clusters

biotools.summary: Display a rectangular heatmap (intensity plot) of a data matrix. By default, both samples (columns) and features (row) of the matrix are sorted according to a hierarchical clustering, and the corresponding dendrogram is plotted. Optionally, panels with additional information about samples and features can be added to the plot.
